course.subject: HUMA
course.name: Approaches to Humanities in China Studies
course.description: This course is designed to train students with the skills of academic research and writing in the field of humanities in general, but with special reference to arts, literature, linguistics, religion, philosophy, history, and anthropology, of China, in particular. Students’ attention will also be drawn to the inherent problems of sources and materials as textual or visual ‘evidence’, and they will be taught how to identify and to tackle with the problem of fallacy of ‘evidence’.

reviews.author: nar
reviews.comment_content:
話就話係 GCS Required Course，不過唔係讀 GCS 讀呢個 course 完全冇問題。

Literature module 主要唔係講咩寫作手法，係分析背景、歷史之類。
(Cultural) Anthropology module 講 field research, family, kinship, marriage, 自梳女之類。
Linguistics module 講象形文字、三書說、韻母之類。

Readings 都係英文 (Linguistics 有啲有俾中文版)。
Course description 寫有 tutorial，其實就冇。
reviews.comment_teaching:
Prof. Shaw (Literature) 就算係大咗肚都會行嚟行去係咁叫人去 discuss 啲 readings 講乜。完 discussion 先會輕輕同你講番佢 ppt 啲問題嘅答案。

Prof. Liu (Anthropology) 講嘢唞氣聲好大，自己有時會俾佢搞到變手動呼吸。從佢講自己嘅 field research 覺得面對研究對象嘅逝世好似有啲唏噓。佢教嘅嘢都係圍繞 readings，不過 ppt 就非常精簡，得幾隻字，圖仲多啲。

Prof. Sun (Linguistics) 講書幾有熱誠，feel 到佢有少少自 high。ppt 非常詳盡，好多頁，cover 晒啲 readings。

TA 就 hea 嘅，上堂淨係傳紙俾你簽 attendance。
reviews.comment_grading:
Attendance 10%
3 Quizzes (each module 20%) 60%
Research Proposal 30%
Library Workshop 1% bonus

我唔係讀 GCS，add-drop 差唔多完先至唔知頭唔知路轆咗入去讀。Quiz 之前先讀 readings，有俾題目就作定先。跟住 3 次 quiz 都 above mean (冇特別去計 any statistics 因為啲分多數黐喺 prof. 嘅 office 門口) (Anthropology 覺得自己寫得幾 9; Linguistics 覺得自己答得幾 uncertain)，三次 quiz (60%) 加埋應該有 51/60 (85%) 左右；Research Proposal 寫多過 min. requirement，但係遲交一日扣咗 1 分 (好抵)；有去到冇用嘅 library workshop；最後唔知點解 A+
reviews.comment_workload:
雖然個 course 有 3 個 modules - Literature, Anthropology, Linguistics ，好似好多嘢咁，但係教嘅嘢係 1000-level 姐，係 Literature 嘅 readings 比較難同多深字。

- Attendance: 少上一兩堂都會拎到滿分。
- Literature 嘅 quiz 可以話係同教嘅嘢冇乜關係，係叫你寫篇 essay 分析一篇也斯嘅詩 (essay 係寫英文)，全班都拎 > 80% (除咗有一千零一個拎 7X% 之外)。
- Anthropology 嘅 quiz 係圍繞 6 篇 readings，prof. 會提早俾 6 條
essay 題目，最好自己讀晒 readings 同作埋 main points 先，到時抽 2 題嚟考。問題仲會有關於 kinship and family 嘅 MC。
- Linguistics 嘅 quiz 睇 ppt 就夠，要理解三書說嘅分類同背啲象形字 (international students 可能會中伏)。Quiz 主要根據三書說將大約 60 個字分類，同有 4 題 short questions 咁，其餘嘅問題好簡單。
- Research Proposal Assignment (min. 6 pages, double-spaced): 有 excel program 幫 prof 隨機 & 平均咁分 students 去其中一個 field，可以同人調。有 guidelines，俾少少心機應該可以拎高分 (呢層其實唔知，no grading info. available!)。Deadline set 喺差唔多 final period 完，遲交 1 日扣 1 分，3 日之後唔收。(Btw Linguistics 會俾埋題目，可以做mini research project instead of research proposal)

reviews.author: makaze
reviews.title: 靚grade👍🏻👍🏻
reviews.comment_content:
分3個module
Anthropology （Prof Liu）
講關於家庭formation、傳統野、research method、婚姻、父系母系社會等。
Linguistics （Prof Sun）
主要教中文字既分類，分得好仔細，例如會意字，表意字等，同埋語言要素，讀音，音標等。
Art （Prof Fu）
簡單來說係藝術鑑賞，基本art既概念會學，同埋artwork背後meaning等，大部分以不同時代既國畫為主。
reviews.comment_teaching:
prof liu 教書ppt好精簡，有reading可以睇但我直接放棄，其實唔睇都ok，佢講野少悶，但係鍾意chur人答問題。

prof sun 好好人，好樂意解答學生問題，ppt非常清晰，就算唔上堂都跟到。

prof fu既堂希望學生踴躍答問題，同開cam，errrr，佢個人有少chur。
reviews.comment_grading:
好grade！！！
每個module 1個quiz 25x3=75
class participation=5
research proposal=20

quiz 1 essay
quiz 2 分辨中文字、短題目
quiz 3 essay （art module要你上堂答問題+canvas discussion去拿bonus points）
research project有guideline教你寫不算太難

A range要above mean就可以！
reviews.comment_workload:
workload不算重
不過要睇下你對呢3個module有無興趣，有興趣的話自然無讀得咁辛苦！
research project係千幾字就ok，唔洗好detail其實，而且係抽籤決定做邊個module，祝你好運～
不過你可以同frd swap的（如果你有frd....

reviews.author: twbr
reviews.title: 唔係好知發生過咩事個course就完咗
reviews.comment_content:
分咗philosophy，history同art history 3個modules；
1. Philosophy d孟子荀子莊子釋迦牟尼冇興趣嘅話會比較難理解，不過肯背就搞得掂個quiz。
2. History主要係講historical narrative。
3. Art history係關於chinese painting嘅特點，例如畫家點樣突顯幅畫入面嘅人嘅身份，quiz都係考我哋識唔識analyse一幅畫。
reviews.comment_teaching:
可能係philosophy，成日都唔知Professor Nelson講緊乜。

Professor So會拍videos要我哋上堂之前睇咗先，冇睇上堂就唔會明佢講咩，佢都好鼓勵我哋課餘時間搵佢傾，對history有興趣嘅話會學到好多嘢。

Professor Fu啲slides好少explanation，最好上堂jot notes，佢都比較注重class participation，會點人名答問題。
reviews.comment_grading:
3 Quizzes－25% each
Research proposal－20%
Class participation－5%

我嘅分：
Philosophy quiz: 17.5/25 (mean: 16.4, s.d.: 3.8)
History quiz: 22.5/25 (mean: 22.1, s.d.: 2.6)
Art History quiz: 20/25 (mean: 19.1, s.d.: 5.4)
Philosophy research proposal: 17/20
Class participation: 2/5

Grade: B+

非常好grade，應該係mean = B+ (:
reviews.comment_workload:
主要係quiz之前要溫書同埋份proposal；
1. Philosophy quiz有mc有sq，淨係考lecture slides唔會考readings。
2. History quiz係open-book 10題mc，可以用electronic devices，可以同人傾，題目仲講埋出自邊份lecture，好輕鬆。
3. Art history quiz全部sq，主要考application，都係open-book，但加埋幾百版slides，最好知道每份lecture講咩先去考。
4. Research proposal係sem頭抽做邊個module，可以同人swap，每個module嘅deadline唔同，寫8版，跟住guidelines寫唔算難。
5. Class participation 4% history，返齊就有，每skip一堂扣1%。淨返嗰1%係art history，另外有bonus，每答3條問題有1%。

reviews.author: climbclimb
reviews.comment_content:
Anthropology is fun, I like this topic so I actually quite like it lol. Linguistics is a no-no for me, I have no interest in identifying the words of Chinese. For literature, it is ok, mainly covers Green Snake, and some basic elements of cinematic actions and basic literature elements.

It is quite easy and nothing deep, each module only last 7-8 lessons, reli quite intro.
reviews.comment_teaching: The classes in Anthropology is really slow-paced, the prof breathes heavily which makes me super bored. And the class mainly surrounded by his story. Prof. Sun is kind, tho I did not listen to his classes as all, he treats students very well as he answers ad replies pretty fast when it comes to some consultations of research proposal. Prof. Ma speaks quite ok, maybe she did study in U.S before idk but overall speaking nth special about her.
reviews.comment_grading:
Anthropology Quiz: 93/100 (Mean: 76.9)
Linguistics Quiz: 67.5/100 (Mean: 70.9)
Literature Quiz: 92/100 (Mean: 75.3)
Research Proposal: below mean (linguistics)
Grade: A

Surprised cuz i got below mean in linguistics and the report, want to swap to another topic but no one willing to swap with me :( I am from busi school so thats a pretty decent grade for me.
reviews.comment_workload: Workload is fine, I just begin watch lecture videos 2 days before lmao. And I did not even attend any linguistics lessons since I got covid during the quiz period fml, I just learnt the concepts during the morning. I did not read any readings for all modules. For Anthropology, the readings are actually useful I think since some concepts are not taught in the lecture. For literature, i got a surprisingly high marks, as I did not even read the book which are compulsory, and the quiz is all about Green Snake which are the book lol. I just immediately searched online during the quiz, and that's definitely fine for people who are lazy like me. Report is 2000-2300 words, but the topic is based on lucky draw:( Cant choose the one you like.

reviews.author: anday
reviews.title: miscellaneous
reviews.comment_content:
Philosophy: Human nature, Zhuang Zhou, Buddhism, Korean Confucianism, Chinese research.
History: direct/indirect evidence
Art: landscape painting, beauty painting, Ancestral portrait

The course title indicates that this course helps us to command research methods in three fields. However, content of the subject exceeded the methodology part sometimes.
reviews.comment_grading:
3 quizes, 25% each + participation + proposal.

For quiz: Just recite the most important points in each section

For proposal: Follow the standard and make the purpose clear

Philosophical quiz: 25/25
History quiz: 25/25 (open book)
Art quiz: 25/25 (open book)
Philosophical proposal: 20/20
Participation: 9/9
reviews.comment_workload:
Designing the proposal took more time than expected. Most of the effort was put on reading existing research and finding new research opportunities.

The quizzes are straightforward and easy.

reviews.author: s20031076
reviews.title: 除左好grade冇其他優點
reviews.comment_teaching:
prof之間缺乏溝通，同TA更甚，Literature Quiz因為TA失誤令唔少同學多左時間做，仲擅自決定將個quiz變成take-home quiz，而且print唔夠poems解決方法竟然係抄落黑板。

三位prof只有prof shaw英文最好聽，其他兩位講野細聲英文難聽仲要好悶，Linguistic都叫可以唔洗上堂因為ppt好詳盡，另外兩個aspect最好上因為ppt冇quiz嘅內容咁濟
reviews.comment_grading:
三次quiz都below mean 一兩分，冇去library workshop，proposal hea寫都有B，算幾好grade

Attendance 10%
Research Proposal 30%
Quiz x 3 每個 20%
Library Workshop 1%
reviews.comment_workload:
每堂都take attendance，冇翻10%嘅堂 = 冇噻10% Attendance分

三次Quiz同一份research proposal，proposal冇guidelines咁濟。

Literature Quiz：用幾個aspects分析也斯嘅詩歌
Anthropology Quiz：比左5條題目翻屋企準備，最後抽兩題出黎考，另外仲有8題MC
Linguistic Quiz：分辨60個象形文字嘅類型，仲有幾題short questions同long questions

Literature Readings唔洗睇，Anthropology一定要睇，Linguistic可以睇可以唔睇，有少部分內容係quiz會考嘅

reviews.author: chimz
reviews.comment_content: 無咩學到，唯一覺得陳博士 (arts module) 嘅ppt真係貼到個course需要，其他睇完都唔明。
reviews.comment_teaching:
上堂同唔上都無咩分別，聽完都無用
Prof Nelson成日失蹤，上三個禮拜tutorial，两次都唔見人，又唔交代點解唔出現，TA又唔係讀philo，唔識lead discussion，浪費時間lol
陳博士令到我有心機keep住讀arts，我覺得佢嘅分析方法簡單易明，等我唔駛驚，因為我本身係藝術白痴，但上堂真係聽唔明，ppt我先明。
reviews.comment_grading:
3次quiz其實差距唔大，我諗arts個module quiz數據就有d作用
arts: full mark: 25; mean: 19.3; s.d. 2.81; highest: 24
reviews.comment_workload:
其實有d chur，但睇完ground rules，你就會充滿希望

3 quizzes (25%; 50 minutes each)
week 5: history: 5 T/F questions (open book; open internet; verbal discussion is allowed)
week 9: arts: 5 T/F questions + 1 essay (open book; open internet)
week 13: philosophy: 6 T/F questions (open book; open internet)

20% draft proposal (中期交預稿，exam period交final version)

5% attendance (間唔中take，唔知佢點數法)

reviews.author: sharon tse
reviews.title: Approaches to Humanities in China Studies
reviews.comment_content: This is an introductory course on humanities study in Chinese culture. Suitable for Chinese (Mandarin/ Cantonese) speakers, although most of the content is in English. Three professors taught in the whole semester, anthropology/linguistics/ literature us covered in 1/3 of the course period. By the end off the course, you learn something from these three area of study. The readings itself may be boring but the content covered was interesting. Here is something new I learnt from the course: 自梭女, Chinese marriage and hidden meanings for ceremonies, poem of 梁秉鈞 in "形象香港", writings of Eileen Chang, graphic symbols of Chinese scripts.
reviews.comment_teaching: Hard to comment on the professors. Prof. Sun was a bit boring in his presentations, and he had a Chinese accent, but his teaching was clear and easy to follow. Many Chinese characters examples were used in the PPT. Professor Liu had years of practical field experience, so real-life examples and photos he took are used in his teaching. Prof. Shaw had very nice English. Three professors delivered the lessons quite differently.
reviews.comment_grading: There were GCS students taking the course, seems to be a required (or elective) course for them. As a Business school students, this may have affected my grade a bit. Although I did all the homework and attended quiz, I didn't read more than 1/4 of the readings during the course, except before quizzes, I still got a B as a final grade. Seems that your major background cannot define your grade.
reviews.comment_workload: Workload was not big. 2 Quiz (Linguistics+Anthropology) + 2 Assignment (Anthropology+Literature) throughout the whole semester. For the quizzes, study the PPT and readings and that's all. For the anthropology assignment, we were asked to interview an elderly (Anyone, can be your grandparents) and describe his/her life in 1000-2000 words. In the literature assignment, we had to write a proposal of a few pages on literature study. I spent one week in library for this assignment.

reviews.author: Time_to_troll
reviews.title: 必睇啦啦隊!
reviews.comment_content:
Philosophy/ History/ Art History
Philosophy咩子乜都講一D   背就okay
History上完都唔知做咩…
Art history講下Chinese painting ge特點etc
reviews.comment_teaching:
Nelson直情將HUMA2911份ppt擺上去 其實都幾有趣 又唔洗明 背就okay

牙So呢就拍埋d videos要上堂前睇 睇完上堂都唔會明 但係個個都扮明…最憎

Fu姐姐呢好注重participation 點名答問題 好煩=.=’
reviews.comment_grading:
3 Quizzes－25x3
Research proposal－20
Class participation－5

Philosophy quiz: 19/25 (mean: 16.4, s.d.: 3.8)
History quiz: 20/25 (mean: 22.1, s.d.: 2.6)
Art History quiz: 16.25/25 (mean: 19.1, s.d.: 5.4)
Philosophy research proposal: 18/20
Class participation: 1.5/9

唔好問我點解class parti係 1.5/9 我都唔知
Grade: B

好grade，拎A+ seems just a bit difficult

私人評價:
Teaching:  Fu姐姐(上左兩堂之後…88)> Nelson (悶到嘔 教學詳情可見我HUMA2911評價)> 牙SO (覺得可以同virgil有得fight 其實我以前都唔信教親Chinese History ge人都悶 後尾發現我錯了… 多麼沉重的教訓…T.T)

Topic:   Nelson> Fu姐姐>牙SO

以實用性 有趣角度黎睇 其實mama 極不建議非GCS學生讀 有更加多有趣實用的HUMA course比您簡 (詳情可參考我HUMA2911 review)
以Grade ge角度黎睇 其實好好啦 但不太建議 因為大把比較low work load HUMA course同時又極靚grade (詳情可參考我HUMA2911 review) 不過若果閣下係非常孜孜不倦 勤學不輟 夜以繼日 夜以繼日 業精於勤 吃苦耐勞的好學生 一定拎到A/A+  基本上ONLY背野

GradeWorkload性價比高

利申: Class parti (全sem上67堂左右) Philo Quiz(6hrs revision) Hist Quiz(1 hr revision) Art Hist Quiz (6hrs revision) Proposal (8hrs)
reviews.comment_workload:
Philo quiz  MC+SQ 淨考lecture slides   SUPERRRRRRRRRRRRRRR EASY ONLY背
個人覺得考得太簡單 溫熟一定full mark到
History quiz   open-book 10mc        SUPERRRRRR EASY
Art history quiz   SQ，主要考application，都係open-book
Research proposal 寫咗5hrs    QUITE EASY
Class participation全sem上左6堂左右….
